title: Spirits All Around You
description:
My special guest tonight is psychic medium Janet O'Carroll who's here to discuss her experiences with the afterlife to include her haunted barn, ghost hunting and reincarnation.


Her website: http://www.psychicfields.com

Wanna listen to the shows without the ads? Become a 'Mysterious Radio Truther' to enjoy every podcast "AD-FREE" right now!
